Translations.Text: Yemwe abemeye! Nimwifashishe ukwihangana n’amasengesho. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ari kumwe n’abihangana
Kandi ntimukavuge ko abishwe baguye mu nzira ya Allah (Jihadi) bapfuye, ahubwo ni bazima18, nyamara mwe ntimubisobanukirwa
Rwose tuzabagerageza dukoresheje kubateza ubwoba, inzara, kugabanuka kw’imitungo, gupfusha abantu no kurumbya imyaka; ngaho geza inkuru nziza ku bihangana
Babandi igihe bahuye nibyago bavuga bati"Mu by’ukuri, turi aba Allah kandi iwe ni ho tuzasubira
Abo bafite impuhwe n’imbabazi bituruka kwa Nyagasani wabo, kandi ni na bo bayobotse

Mu by’ukuri, Swafa na Maruwa19ni bimwe mu bimenyetso bya Allah. Bityo uzakora umutambagiro mutagatifu wa Hija20 cyangwa Umura21 kuri iyo nzu; ntacyo bitwaye kuri we kuyitambagira yombi (iyo misozi ya Swafa na Maruwa). N’uzakora ibyiza ku bushake bwe, mu by’ukuri Allah ni Ushima, Umumenyi uhebuje
Mu by’ukuri, babandi bahishaibimenyetso bigaragara ndetse n’umuyoboro twahishuye, nyuma y’uko tubigaragarije abantu mu gitabo,abo Allah arabavuma ndetse n’abavuma bose bakabasabira imivumo
Uretse abicujije bagakora ibikorwa byiza kandi bakagaragaza (ibyo bari barahishe); abo ni bo nakirira ukwicuza kwabo. Ni nanjye Uwakira ukwicuza,Nyirimbabazi
Mu by’ukuri, abahakanye bakanapfa ari abahakanyi, abo umuvumo wa Allah ubariho, uw’Abamalayika, n’uw’abantu bose
Bazawubamo ubuziraherezo, ntibazoroherezwa ibihano ndetse nta nubwo bazarindirizwa
Kandi Imana yanyu ni Imana imwe, nta yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa by’ukuri uretse yo, Nyirimpuhwe, Nyirimbabazi
